Key Match Events: Everton Camargo scored Hong Kong's sole goal in their match against Iran
Pre-Game Insights: Everton Camargo has been a key player in Hong Kong's domestic league and is seen as a pivotal figure for the team as they compete in the Asian Cup for the first time in over 50 years
Hong Kong's Norwegian coach Jorn Andersen has praised Everton Camargo as'maybe the best player in Hong Kong' for his impact on the team
Miscellaneous Highlights: Hong Kong are competing in the Asian Cup for the first time in over half a century
